mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bicycle_system.sbike_verify_t ( user_id, user_email, verify_type, verify_code, verify_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userEmail},#{verifyType},#{verifyCode},now())
mapper.select: SELECT sb.id, sb.start_time as startTime, sb.use_time as useTime, sb.money FROM sharebicycle_bicycle_t sb WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT st.id, st.user_id as userId, st.bicycle_num as bicycleNum, st.start_time as startTime, st.initial_address as initialAddress, st.end_address as endAddress, st.use_time as useTime, st.money FROM sharebicycle_bicycle_t st WHERE id = #{id}
